articles.title: Tesla Gigafactory Shanghai output holds incredible pace amid rumors of second factory - Electrek.co
articles.description: Tesla’s February numbers in China are out and it confirms that Gigafactory Shanghai is maintaining an incredible output of more than 600,000 electric vehicles per year. With upcoming improvements, Tesla could soon push production to over 1 million units per y…
